description.en_us: A plugin to check cpu temp regularly.

introduction.en_us: A plugin to check cpu temp regularly.

repository.name: cpu_temp
repository.description: A plugin for MCDReforge to check cpu temp regularly
repository.readme: # cpu_temp ----- [中文](https://github.com/R1ckyH/cpu_temp/blob/master/README_cn.md) **For linux only** A plugin for [MCDReforged](https://github.com/Fallen-Breath/MCDReforged) to check cpu temp regularly You have to install python module `daytime`, `psutil` and `apscheduler` to use cpu_temp You can execute `pip install daytime psutil apscheduler` to install it Type `!!temp` or `!!temperature` to use this plugin `!!temp restart` need helper or more permission to use # variable usage ----- edit the variable inside `.mcdr` **(not recommend)** `temp_loop` is loop start when load or not `t_hours`, `t_minutes`, `t_seconds` is the regulay loop interval time `warn_hours`, `warn_minutes`, `warn_seconds` is the warning loop interval time `show_freq` is the frequency that the plugin print log after run regular loop for `show_freq` times(recommand don't change it) `warning_degree`, `high_degree`, `medium_degree` is the warning degre and degree color setup `restart_countdown` is the restart countdown
